column5: Stay like a KING or a QUEEN on KINGSWAY DR in The North Room, in a Queen size bed with a new GhostMattress and a private bathroom. 42 inTV with NetFlix  2 miles to UTA 4 miles to AT&T stadium, Globe Life Ballpark, Six Flags 11 miles to Verizon/Nokia Theater 17 miles to DFW 21 miles to downtown Dallas 14 miles to downtown Fort Worth *** We can arrange pick-ups from anywhere in the DFW Metroplex as well as the airports for an additional fee. See the Getting Around section.
